meanings.sent1: The author republishes their book with a new cover design.
meanings.sent2: The magazine republishes popular articles from past issues.
meanings.sent3: The teacher republishes the homework assignment for the forgetful student.
meanings.sent4: The museum republishes ancient manuscripts for modern readers to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The website republishes old recipes for a new generation of cooks.

meanings.definition: To make a previously published work available again.
meanings.sent1: The company republishes classic novels in digital format.
meanings.sent2: The record label republishes old albums on vinyl for collectors.
meanings.sent3: The bookstore republishes out-of-print books for avid readers.
meanings.sent4: The app republishes vintage photos for users to explore history.
meanings.sent5: The library republishes rare manuscripts for researchers to study.
